description:
Photonics startup pivots to optical interconnect with Passage wafer-scale design

The post Lightmatter Raises $400 Million Series D appeared first on EE Times.
title: Lightmatter Raises $400 Million Series D

description:
Synaptics held its Tech Day 2024 event in San Jose, California, this week, and announced a new series of intelligent connectivity SoCs. It was an opportunity for EE Times to sit down with president and CEO of the company, Michael Hurlston, for an exclusive video interview on everything from the event itself and the announcements […]

The post Exclusive CEO Interview: Michael Hurlston on Synaptics’ Edge AI Focus appeared first on EE Times.
title: Exclusive CEO Interview: Michael Hurlston on Synaptics’ Edge AI Focus
